Project information

  • Category: Parallel Image Processing
  • Client: -
  • Project date: 01 July, 2023

Canny Edge Detection Parallel Implementation

In this project, we will be specifically adopting and enhancing an edge detection algorithm in image processing: the Canny Edge Detection algorithm. It was developed by John F. Canny in 1986 and is well-known for its effective multiple stages of steps in accurately identifying a wide range of edges while suppressing noise and minimizing false edge detections (Sahir, 2019).
